description:
small single-stack <info>Critical Mass</info> <color_yellow>magazine</color>, colored black with a sculpted metal finish.
CM's logo is printed on the side of the magazine, and will probably only work with CM's weapons.

<info>Xeno's SAS4 Weapons pack Modded Content</info>
